summary: Kingdom Hearts is a popular video game series created by Japanese developers Tetsuya Nomura and Shinji Hashimoto. It's a unique mix of Disney and Square Enix worlds, where the main character, Sora, goes on adventures with Disney and Final Fantasy characters. The series has 13 games and counting, with over 36 million copies sold worldwide. It's also a big hit with fans who love the related merchandise like toys, books, and manga.
title: Kingdom Hearts
